short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for changing color of jira cards on board according to status

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tasks needs some time to be done, this tool will highlight the long taking ones.

If card is in view more then 10 days it will be filled with RED color.
If card is in view more then 5 days it will be filled with ORANGE color.
If card is in view more then 2 days it will be filled with YELLOW color.
